segments.text: This place is great . I'm surprised there are so many things here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but it takes a while to find things . It's not organized as carefully as a regular store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the difference between an outlet and a regular store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually a clothes company will send their overstock to an outlet . The prices are very low . But you may find faulty products here too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Sometimes the fault is very small ; if you have a needle and thread , you can fix it yourself . So it's a good deal to buy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's easy for me . I think it's really a good deal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You can save a lot of money in this way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great for me . Look , children's clothes ! I'd like to buy some winter clothes for my son and daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not buy the sweater ? It only costs 30 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'll take it . Are there any jeans ? Xiaohui's jeans are always dirty . I also need four pairs of slippers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many do you want to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ought to make the most of it while I'm here , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1
